Pre-Game Insights: The match will be played at night, with a clear 10-degree difference in temperature between Delhi and Cuttack, which could be a welcoming development for South African players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: There is a 0% rain probability in Cuttack on the day of the match, and the temperature is expected to be hot but clear, allowing players to play for an uninterrupted 40 overs.
Others: The Barabati Stadium will host its first-ever LED-based floodlight for the match.
